short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A useful chrome extension to search and use unicode emoticons/emoji

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly find and copy your favorite emojis with the Search Emoji Tool! This extension provides a quick, searchable popup that helps you locate emojis from the Unicode Emoji List in seconds. Just type in a keyword, hit search, and discover the emoji you need, complete with descriptions and copy-to-clipboard functionality for easy sharing.

Features:

Fast Search: Enter any keyword to instantly filter emojis from the full Unicode emoji list.
Easy Copy: Simply click “Copy” to place the emoji on your clipboard—ready for pasting anywhere.
Smart Filtering: Quickly browse emojis by descriptions, skin tones, and more.
Lightweight & Intuitive: A clean, user-friendly interface that keeps things simple and efficient.
How to Use:

Click on the Search Emoji Tool icon in your Chrome toolbar.
Type a keyword (e.g., "heart," "smile") to search for emojis.
Click "Copy" to save an emoji to your clipboard.
Whether you’re chatting, creating content, or designing, Emoji Finder & Copy Tool is your go-to assistant for finding the perfect emoji. Save time, simplify your searches, and bring some extra expression to your conversations. Download now and start exploring!
